trans-unit.source: Provides pop-up or online Help for controls.
trans-unit.target: 为控件提供弹出或联机帮助。

trans-unit.source: Each instance of HelpProvider maintains a collection of references to controls associated with it.
trans-unit.target: HelpProvider 每个实例保持对与其关联的控件的引用的集合。

trans-unit.source: To associate a Help file with the HelpProvider, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要将与 HelpProvider 关联的帮助文件，将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: You specify the type of Help provided by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A> method and providing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator> value for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 指定通过调用提供的帮助类型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A>方法并提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator>为指定的控件的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A>

trans-unit.source: You provide the keyword or topic for the Help by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你提供的关键字或主题的帮助通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>

trans-unit.source: To open Help to a specific topic, the keyword should be passed in the form *topicName*.htm.
trans-unit.target: 若要打开到特定主题的帮助，关键字应传递在窗体*topicName*.htm。

trans-unit.source: To associate a specific Help string with a control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将特定的帮助字符串与控件关联，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string that you associate with a control using this method is displayed in a pop-up window when the user presses the F1 key while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 当用户按下 F1 键，而在控件有焦点，您将使用此方法的控件相关联的字符串显示在弹出窗口。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property has not been set, you must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method to provide the Help text.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>未设置属性，则必须使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>方法以提供帮助文本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you have set both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> and the Help string, Help based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> will take precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时设置了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>和的帮助字符串中，帮助基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>将优先。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: HelpProvider calls methods on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Help> class to provide Help functionality.
trans-unit.target: HelpProvider 上调用方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Help>类以提供的帮助功能。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Help>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Once you have created an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> method, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A> method to associate your Help topics with a control.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>类，而使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>方法，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A>方法将您的帮助主题与控件关联起来。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this object can provide its extender properties to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 指定此对象是否可以提供其扩展程序属性设置为指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that the externder properties are provided to.
trans-unit.target: 扩展程序属性提供给对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can provide its extender properties; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此对象可以提供其扩展程序属性︰否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Help keyword for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定控件的帮助关键字。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> from which to retrieve the Help topic.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>要从中检索帮助主题。

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword associated with this control, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref> is currently configured to display the entire Help file or is configured to provide a Help string.
trans-unit.target: 与此控件关联的 Help 关键字或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>当前被配置为显示整个帮助文件，或配置为提供的帮助字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"></xref> setting for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"></xref>设置为指定的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> from which to retrieve the Help navigator.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>要从中检索帮助导航器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"></xref> setting for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"> </xref>设置为指定的控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the contents of the pop-up Help window for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 返回为指定的控件弹出帮助窗口的内容。

trans-unit.source: To display this Help string at run time, the user presses the F1 key while the specified control has the input focus.
trans-unit.target: 若要在运行时显示此帮助字符串，将用户按 F1 键时指定的控件具有输入的焦点。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> from which to retrieve the Help string.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>要从中检索帮助字符串。

trans-unit.source: The Help string associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 与此控件关联的帮助字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified control's Help should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否应显示指定的控件的帮助。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method to associate a keyword or prompt with a specified control, calling this method automatically returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>方法要与指定的控件，自动调用此方法，则会返回关联的关键字或提示符`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override this behavior by passing `false` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过传递重写此行为`false`到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> for which Help will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>将为其显示帮助。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if Help will be displayed for the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件，则将显示帮助否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the name of the Help file associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定与此关联的帮助文件的名称<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The file name retrieved by this method identifies the file that provides Help support for all the controls for which this object provides Help.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检索到的文件名称标识此对象为其提供帮助的所有控件提供帮助支持的文件。

trans-unit.source: This file name can designate either a compiled Help (.chm) file or a raw HTML file.
trans-unit.target: 已编译的帮助 (.chm) 文件或原始 HTML 文件，可以指定此文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the Help file.
trans-unit.target: 帮助文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: This can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是 C:\path\sample.chm 或 /folder/file.htm 窗体。

trans-unit.source: Removes the Help associated with the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 移除与指定控件关联的帮助。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the designer.
trans-unit.target: 在设计器使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The control to remove Help from.
trans-unit.target: 要从中移除帮助的控件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the keyword used to retrieve Help when the user invokes Help for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于检索帮助，当用户调用为指定的控件的帮助关键字。

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword provides the key information to retrieve the Help associated with this control from the Help file specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 帮助关键字提供了要检索与指定的帮助文件从该控件关联的帮助的密钥信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: To open Help to a specific topic, the keyword should be passed in the form *topicName*.htm.
trans-unit.target: 若要打开到特定主题的帮助，关键字应传递在窗体*topicName*.htm。

trans-unit.source: To clear the keyword, call the SetHelpKeyword method with a `keyword` value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除关键字，请调用具有的 SetHelpKeyword 方法`keyword`值`null`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that specifies the control for which to set the Help topic.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> ，指定要为其设置帮助主题的控件。

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword to associate with the control.
trans-unit.target: 与控件关联的帮助关键字。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Help command to use when retrieving Help from the Help file for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 指定从指定的控件的帮助文件中检索帮助时要使用的帮助命令。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> for which to set the Help keyword.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>为其设置的帮助关键字。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The value of navigator is not one of the values.
trans-unit.target: 值 navigator 不是一个值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Help string associated with the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 指定与指定控件关联的帮助字符串。

trans-unit.source: The Help string that you specify in the `helpString` parameter is displayed in a pop-up window when the user presses the F1 key while the specified control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的帮助字符串`helpString`参数显示在弹出窗口中，当用户指定的控件具有焦点时按 F1 键。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> with which to associate the Help string.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>要与关联的帮助字符串。

trans-unit.source: The Help string associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 与控件关联的帮助字符串。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether Help is displayed for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否为指定的控件显示帮助。

trans-unit.source: If you previously called the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> for the control specified in the `ctl` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> automatically displays Help for that control.
trans-unit.target: 如果以前称为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>中指定的控件`ctl`参数，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>该控件将自动显示帮助。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To modify this behavior, call the SetShowHelp method, specifying `false` in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改此行为，请调用 SetShowHelp 方法中，指定`false`中`value`参数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> for which Help is turned on or off.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>为该帮助打开还是关闭。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if Help displays for the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用于控制，显示的帮助否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains supplemental data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含有关补充数据的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，其中包含有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，表示当前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns a string that includes the type and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>.
trans-unit.target: ToString 方法将返回一个字符串，包括类型和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>属性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示当前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref>。
